item.description:
If you are into Rock Music then I'm certain you know of Queensryche.
They have a new Album that pays tribute to "American Soldier" and lots of other great ones like Empire as well.

Come on down to the House of Blues and check them out with me.
I have several of Queensryche albums and really like Empire in particular, But have never made it to one of their shows. Well I Plan on going to this one, and would enjoy some company.

Queensryche has some great albums and is known for hits like Silent lucidity, Jet City Woman and other great tunes.

http://www.queensrych...

Logistics are a bit painful for group ticket purchases and the seats are typically numbered and assigned.
I see the tickets are shown as $25 general admission standing room only on ticketmaster, so this shouldn't be an issue.

Buy your tickets HERE!

The House of Blues is a nice place to see a show, But I found their food options in the venue very limited so be fore warned.

I'm thinking drinks or mingle somewhere after the show.. up for suggestions.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll exchange Cell # with member with tickets to the show.
item.name: Queensryche @ House Of Blues
